Package il.ac.hit.expensemanagement.model

Interface IModelExpenseDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
ModelExpenseDAO
public interface IModelExpenseDAO
IModelExpenseDAO handles all the data in the database

  • Method Details

    • addExpenseItem

      void addExpenseItem​(ExpenseItem item) throws ExpenseManagerException
      Adds a new expense to the database
      Parameters:

      ExpenseManagerException

    • getAllExpenses

      Report getAllExpenses​(java.lang.String user) throws ExpenseManagerException
      Extracts all the data from the database on expense item
      Returns:
      DataAllExpenses object which holds all the expense item data
      Throws:
      ExpenseManagerException

    • getReport

      Report getReport​(java.sql.Date start, java.sql.Date end, java.lang.String user) throws ExpenseManagerException
      Builds a Report object that holds all the expense items in the database between start and end dates
      Parameters:
      start - Holds reference to an sql.date object for the starting date
      end - Holds reference to an sql.date object for the ending date
      Returns:
      Report object that holds all the data between the dates start and end
      Throws:
      ExpenseManagerException
